item.title: 3 Steps to Address Human Impact of AI Adoption in the Workplace
item.description:

item.title: Mind the Gap: Cloud Spending is Perplexing CFOs
item.description:
Cloud spending confusion is rising among CFOs. An IBM executive explains how FinOps, automation, and AI-powered solutions can improve cost visibility and management.
